subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal will close out the best season in his career with a difficult challenge against Argentina — and 20-year-0ld phenom Juan Martin Del Potro — in the Davis Cup final.
snippet: Rafael Nadal will close out the best season in his career with a difficult challenge against Argentina — and 20-year-0ld phenom Juan Martin Del Potro — in the Davis Cup final.
